comments.body: Just out of curiosity, what's the reason for excluding the legacy cluster tag here?

There is no major reason for excluding the legacy cluster tag. It is fairly old, EKS doesn't use the tag and I was thinking more of dropping the legacy burden. Let me know if we need to support the legacy tag. I intend to backport this change to 1.19 as well.

@justinsb or @nckturner probably have more context on this. I would be interested to know if there are people still using legacy cluster role tag and if we should consider it here. Not blocking though
